verses.name: 1 Kings 4:16
verses.text: Baanah the son of Hushai was in Asher and in Aloth:

verses.name: 1 Kings 4:17
verses.text: Jehoshaphat the son of Paruah, in Issachar:

verses.name: 1 Kings 4:18
verses.text: Shimei the son of Elah, in Benjamin:

verses.name: 1 Kings 4:19
verses.text: Geber the son of Uri was in the country of Gilead, in the country of Sihon king of the Amorites, and of Og king of Bashan; and he was the only officer which was in the land.

verses.name: 1 Kings 4:20
verses.text: Judah and Israel were many, as the sand which is by the sea in multitude, eating and drinking, and making merry.
